ygData.subject: Re: New Patch.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Since you seem to have some involvement it this, do you know when the following bugs are going to be fixed? Accellerando and SoW: When you play accelerando
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Jun 10/99, "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...> wrote:
> From: "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...>
>
> The initial song idea and framework, along with three working titles, was
> mine, Geoffrey poked holes in it, had to the insight to make bards immune to
> mana regen, picked one of the three titles, and took it to the next stage
> for approval. Ryan freaked out, calmed down, and then the coders went to
> work.

Since you seem to have some involvement it this, do you know when the
following bugs are going to be fixed?

Accellerando and SoW:
When you play accelerando and someone has SoW on, when the
accellerando effect fades, the person's speed is reset to character
default, dispite the fact that the SoW icon still shows and zoning
restores SoW. This also happens with other songs that duplicate spells,
like levitate and water breathing. This bug is really annoying and has
been reported since beta P4.

L30 song still has the range bug that was fixed for the Furfil's songs.

If a druid casts shared wolf form on you while you are playing a song,
your songs stick, just like they did with Tomahawks until the last
patch.



--
